description: White False Indigo (Baptisia alba var. macrophylla) is an amazing flowering plant species that is perfect for any landscape or garden. Its foliage is green and its beautiful white flowers, which decorate it throughout the summer season, are highly fragrant. It is a low-maintenance, drought-resistant plant and is also deer-resistant. Plus, it's easy to propagate - White False Indigo can easily produce new plants from clippings that can be planted directly in the garden! The plant will also create a home for many wildlife species, such as butterflies and birds. White False Indigo is definitely an amazing addition to any garden.
